item.title: ISRO Successfully Launches GSAT-24 Communication Satellite
item.description: India's space agency deploys GSAT-24 to strengthen regional communications and broadcasting services.

item.title: New AI Model Exceeds GPT-5 Benchmarks in Reasoning Tests
item.description: A research team publishes an AI that outperforms current benchmarks on complex reasoning tasks.

item.title: Apple Announces Vision Pro 2 With Major Upgrades
item.description: Apple unveils the Vision Pro 2 featuring improved optics, battery life and collaborative spatial features.

item.title: India Records Highest Solar Power Production in History
item.description: Nation-wide solar output peaks, reflecting rapid capacity growth and favourable weather conditions.

item.title: Tesla Unveils New Electric Bike Concept in Berlin
item.description: Tesla reveals an urban electric bike prototype blending the company's EV design language with lightweight e-mobility.

item.title: Google Adds Hindi & Tamil Support to Gemini Live AI
item.description: Real-time spoken and written support for Hindi and Tamil expands Gemini Live's reach across South Asia.

item.title: Scientists Discover Earth-Like Planet in TRAPPIST-1 System
item.description: A newly characterised planet in the TRAPPIST-1 system shows signs of temperate conditions and a rocky surface.

item.title: Meta Introduces Ultra-Realistic Avatars for VR Meetings
item.description: Meta showcases avatars with detailed facial expressions and natural motion to improve virtual collaboration.

item.title: WHO Releases Updated Report on Global Nutrition 2025
item.description: The WHO publishes a comprehensive report highlighting global nutrition trends, challenges and recommendations for 2025.

item.title: Amazon Launches Drone Delivery Service in Bengaluru
item.description: Amazon launches a pilot drone delivery service in Bengaluru to speed up small-package logistics in select neighbourhoods.

item.title: Japan Hit by 6.8-Magnitude Earthquake, Tsunami Warning Issued
item.description: A strong 6.8 earthquake struck Japan’s northeast region early today, prompting emergency tsunami alerts and widespread transportation disruption.

item.title: UN Chief Warns Climate Change Is "Accelerating Beyond Predictions"
item.description: The UN has issued a severe climate warning, stating that global warming is advancing faster than scientific models expected.

item.title: Apple Introduces Next-Gen AI Assistant for iPhone
item.description: Apple unveiled a next-generation AI assistant capable of on-device reasoning and new productivity features.

item.title: India & China Hold High-Level Peace Talks After Border Tension
item.description: India and China held talks focused on de-escalation and disengagement along the LAC.

item.title: NASA Confirms Water Ice in Lunar South Pole Region
item.description: NASA's Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter detected water ice in permanently shadowed lunar craters near the south pole.

item.title: Global Stock Markets Dip After Latest US Inflation Figures
item.description: Markets reacted to stronger-than-expected US inflation, increasing uncertainty about interest-rate paths.

item.title: UK Unveils New AI Safety Regulations for Tech Companies
item.description: The UK published an AI Safety Act that introduces audits and mandatory safety evaluations for high-risk systems.

item.title: Saudi Arabia Announces New Futuristic Smart Mega-City
item.description: A new Vision 2030 smart city will integrate AI, renewables and autonomous transport to attract global investment.

item.title: WHO Reports Major Decline in Global COVID-19 Cases
item.description: WHO reports a substantial drop in infections and hospitalizations, citing vaccination and immunity trends.

item.title: Global Electric Vehicle Sales Hit Record High in 2025
item.description: IEA reports record EV sales in 2025, driven by cheaper batteries, charging networks and incentives.
